description: I can think, I can code, I can test. Manager of one.

title: I can
think
sections.content: I don't just go through the motions â€” I solve problems. I think about what each test is actually worth, and I write the kind that let me sleep soundly.

title: I can
code
sections.content: Yes, I actually write code. I use AI tools to speed things up, but I can definitely code on my own. Whether I'm solving testing problems at work or tinkering with hobby projects, coding is something I genuinely enjoy doing.

title: I can
test
sections.content: Testing software has been my thing for most of my career. I still genuinely enjoy it, and yeah, I'm pretty good at it too.

title: manager
of one
sections.content: I manage myself pretty well. I take ownership, get things done, and own both my successes and mistakes.
